column1: Accept cryptocurrency payments (SOMI) through the Somnia Payment Gateway.
column2: Accept cryptocurrency payments (SOMI) through the Somnia Payment Gateway.

column1: Enable or disable the Somnia cryptocurrency payment method.
column2: Enable or disable the Somnia cryptocurrency payment method.

column1: Payment method title displayed to customers during checkout.
column2: Payment method title displayed to customers during checkout.

column1: Payment method description shown to customers. Explain the cryptocurrency payment process.
column2: Payment method description shown to customers. Explain the cryptocurrency payment process.

column1: Base URL of the Somnia Payment Gateway (e.g., http://localhost:5000 or https://gateway.somnia.network). Use HTTPS in production.
column2: Base URL of the Somnia Payment Gateway (e.g., http://localhost:5000 or https://gateway.somnia.network). Use HTTPS in production.

column1: Your unique merchant identifier from the Somnia Payment Gateway. Must be a positive integer.
column2: Your unique merchant identifier from the Somnia Payment Gateway. Must be a positive integer.

column1: Time in minutes before a payment expires. Must be between 5 and 120 minutes. Default: 30 minutes.
column2: Time in minutes before a payment expires. Must be between 5 and 120 minutes. Default: 30 minutes.

column1: Click to test connectivity to the payment gateway.
column2: Click to test connectivity to the payment gateway.

column1: Optional: Enter IP addresses allowed to send payment callbacks, one per line. Leave empty to allow all IPs. Use this for additional security if your gateway has static IPs.
column2: Optional: Enter IP addresses allowed to send payment callbacks, one per line. Leave empty to allow all IPs. Use this for additional security if your gateway has static IPs.

column1: Enable detailed logging of all gateway communication. Logs are written to var/log/somnia_payment.log. Disable in production.
column2: Enable detailed logging of all gateway communication. Logs are written to var/log/somnia_payment.log. Disable in production.

column1: Display order of this payment method in checkout. Lower numbers appear first.
column2: Display order of this payment method in checkout. Lower numbers appear first.

column1: Payment gateway is currently unavailable. Please try again later or choose a different payment method.
column2: Payment gateway is currently unavailable. Please try again later or choose a different payment method.

column1: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again.
column2: An error occurred while processing your payment. Please try again.

column1: Merchant ID must be a positive integer.
column2: Merchant ID must be a positive integer.

column1: Payment amount mismatch: order total %1, paid amount %2
column2: Payment amount mismatch: order total %1, paid amount %2

column1: Order confirmation email sent to customer.
column2: Order confirmation email sent to customer.

column1: Gateway URL must use HTTPS in production mode. Please update your configuration.
column2: Gateway URL must use HTTPS in production mode. Please update your configuration.

column1: Invalid payment ID format. Must be a valid UUID.
column2: Invalid payment ID format. Must be a valid UUID.

column1: Invalid order ID format. Must be alphanumeric.
column2: Invalid order ID format. Must be alphanumeric.

column1: Invalid gateway URL format. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.
column2: Invalid gateway URL format. Must be a valid HTTP or HTTPS URL.

column1: Invalid merchant ID. Must be a positive integer.
column2: Invalid merchant ID. Must be a positive integer.

column1: Invalid payment timeout. Must be between 5 and 120 minutes.
column2: Invalid payment timeout. Must be between 5 and 120 minutes.

column1: Please enter Gateway URL before testing.
column2: Please enter Gateway URL before testing.

column1: Please enter Merchant ID before testing.
column2: Please enter Merchant ID before testing.

column1: After placing your order, you will be redirected to our secure payment gateway to complete your cryptocurrency payment. The payment process is simple:
column2: After placing your order, you will be redirected to our secure payment gateway to complete your cryptocurrency payment. The payment process is simple:

column1: You'll be redirected to the payment gateway
column2: You'll be redirected to the payment gateway

column1: Send the exact SOMI amount to the provided address
column2: Send the exact SOMI amount to the provided address

column1: You'll be redirected back to the store
column2: You'll be redirected back to the store

column1: Note: Your order will be processed once the payment is confirmed on the blockchain.
column2: Note: Your order will be processed once the payment is confirmed on the blockchain.

column1: Thank you for your order! To complete your purchase, please follow the payment instructions below.
column2: Thank you for your order! To complete your purchase, please follow the payment instructions below.

column1: Click the payment link below to proceed to the payment gateway
column2: Click the payment link below to proceed to the payment gateway

column1: You will be redirected to complete your payment using SOMI cryptocurrency
column2: You will be redirected to complete your payment using SOMI cryptocurrency

column1: After successful payment, you will receive an order confirmation email
column2: After successful payment, you will receive an order confirmation email

column1: Your order will be processed once payment is confirmed on the blockchain
column2: Your order will be processed once payment is confirmed on the blockchain

column1: This payment link will expire in %timeout minutes. Please complete your payment before the expiration time.
column2: This payment link will expire in %timeout minutes. Please complete your payment before the expiration time.

column1: Note: Your order is currently pending payment. Once we receive confirmation of your cryptocurrency payment, your order will be processed and shipped.
column2: Note: Your order is currently pending payment. Once we receive confirmation of your cryptocurrency payment, your order will be processed and shipped.

column1: Your order is awaiting cryptocurrency payment confirmation.
column2: Your order is awaiting cryptocurrency payment confirmation.

column1: Payment must be completed within %1 minutes
column2: Payment must be completed within %1 minutes

column1: You will receive a confirmation email once payment is verified
column2: You will receive a confirmation email once payment is verified

column2: Payment confirmation may take a few minutes due to blockchain processing

column1: Please do not close your browser until payment is complete.
column2: Please do not close your browser until payment is complete.

column1: Your cryptocurrency payment has been successfully confirmed!
column2: Your cryptocurrency payment has been successfully confirmed!
